doc:
Robert-Guillaume Casadesus https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert-Guillaume_Casadesus 0 Robert Gabriel Guillaume Casadesus, known as Robert Casa (23 January 1878 in Paris, France – 30 May 1940) was a French composer, singer and stage and film actor. He was a member of a prominent French musical family, and best known today as the father of the famous classical pianist Robert Casadesus. He was the brother of Henri Casadesus and Marius Casadesus, and grandfather of Jean Casadesus. He composed several songs, instrumental pieces, and operettas, including La Ribaude and La Reine de l'Or. Robert_Gabriel_Guillaume_Casadesus , known as Robert_Casa ( 23_January_1878 in Paris , France – 30_May_1940 ) was a_French_composer , singer_and_stage and film_actor . He was a_member of a_prominent_French_musical_family , and best known today as the_father of the_famous_classical_pianist_Robert_Casadesus . He was the_brother of Henri_Casadesus and Marius_Casadesus , and grandfather of Jean_Casadesus . He composed several_songs , instrumental_pieces , and operettas , including La_Ribaude and La_Reine de l'Or .
